detailed_description: Measure of a character's physical health and wellness. Whenever a character takes physical damage or is sick, this stat decreases. If it reaches 0, the character dies.

Measure of a character's mental health. Actions that require thinking, perceiving, or mental actions consume Sanity. Additionally, traumatic events and sustained combat further reduce sanity. If a player is reduced to 0 sanity, they must randomize a new unique character flaw and may only make randmoized Stress Reponse Actions.
Measure of the the character's physical stamina. Physical actions consume Stamina.
EXP is used to enable character growth. EXP can be used to enhance their character's stats and abilities.
